filter_columns.name: cf_GroupName
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Groups'] && data['AD_Groups']['cn'] ? data['AD_Groups']['cn'] 
		: data['G_Groups'] && data['G_Groups']['name'] ? data['G_Groups']['name']
        : data['NIM_Groups'] && data['NIM_Groups']['Name'] ? data['NIM_Groups']['Name']
		: '';

filter_columns.name: cf_MemberName
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Users'] && data['AD_Users']['displayName'] ? data['AD_Users']['displayName'] 
		: data['G_Users'] && data['G_Users']['fullName'] ? data['G_Users']['fullName']
        : data['NIM_Users'] && data['NIM_Users']['DisplayName'] ? data['NIM_Users']['DisplayName']
		: '';

filter_columns.name: cf_Username
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Users'] && data['AD_Users']['sAMAccountName'] ? data['AD_Users']['sAMAccountName'] 
		: data['G_Users'] && data['G_Users']['primaryEmail'] ? data['G_Users']['primaryEmail']
        : data['NIM_Users'] && data['NIM_Users']['Name'] ? data['NIM_Users']['Name']
		: '';

filter_columns.name: cf_GroupID_Number
filter_columns.javascript:
// Special logic since Number Fields don't like NULL or empty values (they default to 0)
return data['RoleGroupOverrides']['GroupID_Number'] ? data['RoleGroupOverrides']['GroupID_Number'] : null;;

filter_columns.name: cf_MemberID_Number
filter_columns.javascript:
// Special logic since NIM doens't like NULL or empty Number fields in lookup.
return data['RoleGroupOverrides']['MemberID_Number'] ? data['RoleGroupOverrides']['MemberID_Number'] : null;

meta_config.notes: Provides data to Audit Query used in main app grid, list of groups with overrides.
Used in Group Dropdown when adding a new override.  Other systems should be appended to this filter.
Sub filter appends to the AD filter.

filter_columns.name: cf_GroupKey
filter_columns.javascript:
// Either GroupID or GroupID_Number.  Needed for DropDown, thus needs to be a String.
return '' + data['groups']['ID'];

filter_columns.name: cf_GroupName
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Groups'] && data['AD_Groups']['cn'] ? data['AD_Groups']['cn'] 
		: data['G_Groups'] && data['G_Groups']['name'] ? data['G_Groups']['name']
        : data['NIM_Groups'] && data['NIM_Groups']['Name'] ? data['NIM_Groups']['Name']
		: '';

filter_columns.name: cf_MemberName
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Users'] && data['AD_Users']['displayName'] ? data['AD_Users']['displayName'] 
		: data['G_Users'] && data['G_Users']['fullName'] ? data['G_Users']['fullName']
        : data['NIM_Users'] && data['NIM_Users']['DisplayName'] ? data['NIM_Users']['DisplayName']
		: '';

filter_columns.name: cf_Username
filter_columns.javascript:
return data['AD_Users'] && data['AD_Users']['sAMAccountName'] ? data['AD_Users']['sAMAccountName'] 
		: data['G_Users'] && data['G_Users']['primaryEmail'] ? data['G_Users']['primaryEmail']
        : data['NIM_Users'] && data['NIM_Users']['Name'] ? data['NIM_Users']['Name']
		: '';

meta_config.notes: Used in grid showing the list of override users for the selected group.
Membership filter used by Role Model.
Lists available users that do not have an override for the selected group.  Other systems users should be appended to this filter.
Sub filter appends to the MembersPending-AD filter.
Mapping filter used to remove expired overrides.

filter_columns.name: cf_RoleName
cf_GroupName

meta_config.notes: Role Generator filter used to create roles for overridden groups.
Generate roles for defined Role Overrides.

data.name: RoleGroupOverrides_GroupList
data.query:
SELECT
	cf_GroupName,
    GroupID,
    GroupID_Number,
    cf_System,
    COUNT(COALESCE(GroupID, GroupID_Number)) as MemberCount
FROM f_App_RoleGroupOverrides_GroupList
GROUP BY cf_GroupName,GroupID,GroupID_Number,cf_System
ORDER BY cf_GroupName

unit.text_value: WARNING - Only add Groups Managed by the NIM RoleModel.  Other groups will have all members removed except those defined here.

props.description: Add Users to Role Managed Groups

javascript.javascript:
let value = (data['grid_GroupID'] ?? data['dd_GroupID']);
return value ? value : 'null';

let value = (data['grid_GroupID_Number'] ?? data['dd_GroupID_Number']);
return value ? value : 'null';

let value = (data['grid_GroupID_Number'] ?? data['dd_GroupID_Number']);
return value ? value : null;

meta_config.notes: Add users to Groups managed by NIM, who don't normally qualify for the group.
